Acne: Use a gentle cleanser twice a day.
Avoid heavy makeup and oil-based skincare products.
Consider over-the-counter products with salicylic acid or benzoyl peroxide.
Rosacea: Avoid hot drinks and spicy food.
Consult a dermatologist for anti-inflammatory treatments.
Melanoma: Avoid sun exposure and use SPF 50+ sunscreen.
Track any changes in moles or dark spots.
Perioral Dermatitis: Stop using topical steroids if prescribed.
Use mild, non-irritating skin care products.
Consult a dermatologist for oral antibiotics.
Warts: Cryotherapy or dermatological procedures may be needed.
Normal: Stay hydrated and eat a balanced diet.
